title: Pak Woman Yelled at Polio Workers? No, Tarek Fatah Gets It Wrong
subtitle: Fact Check: Tarek Fatah shared a video on twitter with a claim that a Pakistani woman yelled at polio vaccine volunteers who came to her house. However, the video has been taken from a scene in Pakistani movie, Load Wedding.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
Canada-based TV commentator and writer, Tarek Fatah shared a video of a woman screaming at polio vaccine volunteers with a claim that it is from Pakistan.

“Pakistani mother slams the door shut in the face of Polio workers. Screams at the two female volunteers,” the caption read.
